resources.string:
To add the Traditional XML Widget:

 1. Long-press on your home screen.
 2. Tap "Widgets".
 3. Find "XML Widget" in the list and drag it to your home screen.

 It will display the current time and has a button to manually update.

To add the Glance Widget:

 1. Long-press on your home screen.
 2. Tap "Widgets".
 3. Find "Glance Widget" in the list and drag it to your home screen.

 It will display the current time and has a button to manually refresh.
